name: Tom Durden
desc: John transformed my business website into something that was both visually stunning and very functional. I was so impressed, I returned for a complete re-branding project

name: Alex Kalinski
desc: The website when completed completely surpassed all my expectations and I am totally thrilled. Any tweaks and edits that were needed were minimal and done quickly.

name: Martin Haarold
desc: John has recently helped me to customize my website and I found him to be absolutely superb. He was able to translate exactly what I wanted into my website
